00159     bool Vector3::operator== (const Vector3 &Vec) const
00160         { return( Vec.X == this->X && Vec.Y == this->Y && Vec.Z == this->Z ); }
00161 
00162     bool Vector3::operator== (const btVector3 &Vec) const
00163         { return( Vec.getX() == this->X && Vec.getY() == this->Y && Vec.getZ() == this->Z ); }

00165     bool Vector3::operator== (const Ogre::Vector3 &Vec) const
00166         { return ( Vec.x == this->X && Vec.y == this->Y && Vec.z == this->Z ); }
00167 
00168     bool Vector3::operator!= (const Vector3 &Vec) const
00169         { return ( Vec.X != this->X || Vec.Y != this->Y || Vec.Z != this->Z ); }
00170 
00171     bool Vector3::operator!= (const btVector3 &Vec) const
00172         { return ( Vec.getX() != this->X || Vec.getY() != this->Y || Vec.getZ() != this->Z ); }

00174     bool Vector3::operator!= (const Ogre::Vector3 &Vec) const
00175         { return ( Vec.x != this->X || Vec.y != this->Y || Vec.z != this->Z ); }

00240     Vector3 Vector3::CrossProduct( const Vector3& Vec ) const
00241     {
00242         return Vector3(
00243                 this->Y * Vec.Z - this->Z * Vec.Y,
00244                 this->Z * Vec.X - this->X * Vec.Z,
00245                 this->X * Vec.Y - this->Y * Vec.X
00246             );
00247     }
00248 
00249     Real Vector3::dotProduct(const Vector3& Vec) const
00250     {
00251         return this->X * Vec.X + this->Y * Vec.Y + this->Z * Vec.Z;
00252     }
00253 
00254     void Vector3::Normalize()
00255     {
00256         Real TempLength = this->Distance(Vector3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f));
00257         if (0!=TempLength)
00258         {
00259              (*this) /= TempLength;
00260         }else{
00261             /// @todo discuss the merits throwing an error here.
00262         }
00263     }
00264 
00265     Vector3 Vector3::GetNormal() const
00266     {
00267         Real TempLength = this->Distance(Vector3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f));
00268         if (0!=TempLength)
00269         {
00270             return (*this) / TempLength;
00271         }else{
00272             /// @todo discuss the merits throwing an error here.
00273             return (*this);
00274         }
00275     }
00276 
00277     Vector3 Vector3::GetDirection(const Vector3& Destination) const
00278     {
00279         Vector3 Dir = Destination - *this;
00280         Dir.Normalize();
00281         return Dir;
00282     }
00283 
00284     void Vector3::Inverse()
00285     {
00286         /// @todo fix division by zero in Vector3::Inverse()
00287         X=1/X;
00288         Y=1/Y;
00289         Z=1/Z;
00290     }

00292     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00293     // Manual Conversions
00294     btVector3 Vector3::GetBulletVector3() const
00295     {
00296         btVector3 Theirs;
00297         Theirs.setX(this->X);
00298         Theirs.setY(this->Y);
00299         Theirs.setZ(this->Z);
00300         Theirs.setW(0);
00301         return Theirs;
00302     }

00308         this->Z=Ours.getZ();

00343     Real Vector3::Distance(const Vector3 &OtherVec) const
00344     {
00345         float Xdelta = Ogre::Math::Abs(this->X - OtherVec.X);
00346         float Ydelta = Ogre::Math::Abs(this->Y - OtherVec.Y);
00347         float Zdelta = Ogre::Math::Abs(this->Z - OtherVec.Z);
00348         return Ogre::Math::Sqrt( Xdelta*Xdelta + Ydelta*Ydelta + Zdelta*Zdelta );
00349     }
00350

00419 #ifdef PHYSXML
00420 std::istream& operator >> (std::istream& stream, phys::Vector3& Vec)
00421 {
00422     phys::String OneTag( phys::xml::GetOneTag(stream) );
00423     std::auto_ptr<phys::xml::Document> Doc( phys::xml::PreParseClassFromSingleTag("phys::", "Vector3", OneTag) );
00424 
00425     Doc->GetFirstChild() >> Vec;
00426 
00427     return stream;
00428 }
00429 
00430 phys::xml::Node& operator >> (const phys::xml::Node& OneNode, phys::Vector3& Vec)
00431 {
00432     if ( phys::String(OneNode.Name())==phys::String("Vector3") )
00433     {
00434         if(OneNode.GetAttribute("Version").AsInt() == 1)
00435         {
00436             Vec.X=OneNode.GetAttribute("X").AsReal();
00437             Vec.Y=OneNode.GetAttribute("Y").AsReal();
00438             Vec.Z=OneNode.GetAttribute("Z").AsReal();
00439         }else{
00440             throw( phys::Exception("Incompatible XML Version for Vector3: Not Version 1"));
00441         }
00442     }else{
00443         throw( phys::Exception(phys::StringCat("Attempting to deserialize a Vector3, found a ", OneNode.Name())));
00444     }
00445 }
00446 #endif // \PHYSXML
